headline: Cognizant Schedules Third Quarter 2025 Earnings Release and Conference Call
summary: Cognizant (Nasdaq: CTSH), a leading provider of information technology, consulting, and business process services, will announce results for the third quarter of 2025 on Wednesday, October 29, 2025 before market open. The shift to a morning call time from previously after market close will better accommodate our global associates and participants.
